column5: in 2000, my group fished brownstone lake with excellent adventures out of ear falls. there was access to shearstone lake via a long portage but shearstone was incredible. a very large, untapped lake loaded with large walleye and pike. in 2001, lac seul /amik lodges outfitters got an land use permit (LUP) to build a cabin on shearstone. it opens this week for the first year of fishing. now's the chance to get into a virgin lake - comfortably.anybody want more detail?: [email protected]i'd love to hear if anybody else knows about lakes opening for the first time. thanks.
